(Note: STZ is an abbreviation for Streptozotocin, which is a type of antibiotic and chemotherapeutic agent used primarily for the treatment of diabetes mellitus. However, in this context, it is mentioned as a cause of memory impairment, so it is considered a chemical entity.)
